Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 99th overall pick, by Minnesota in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off John Elia (NYY)...
Injured on 4/14/2019 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 5/15/2019, off John Stephens (NYY)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Atlanta on 5/21/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2019, hitting .650 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,392,857 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Washington on 9/6/2020...
Injured on 9/14/2020 with a Ruptured Medial Collateral Ligament, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/10/2021 to a 4-year deal worth $8,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2021, hitting .526 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
